author: Joshua Fluke
description:
Recruiters on LinkedIn are absolutely losing it. One says you can’t answer the phone with “hello.” Another says your thank-you email is “too generic.” Then someone else says if you lean too close to the camera you’re desperate. Apparently, the job market has become a minefield where breathing wrong disqualifies you from employment.

In this video, we explore the absurd contradictions of recruiter advice, where every “tip” sounds like satire and common sense has been outsourced to ChatGPT. From the recruiter who demands your “inner fire” for their startup to the founder who rejects anyone who asks about work-life balance, it’s peak LinkedIn lunacy.

If you’ve ever wondered why getting a job feels like auditioning for a reality show you didn’t sign up for, this one’s for you.

title: RECRUITERS ON LINKEDIN ARE LOSING IT!
